name: Tab Time Scramble Picture Game
description:
A simple scrambled picture game based on Tabitha Brown's Tab Time short on Youtube.

Help Ms. Tab unscramble all of the pictures of her and her friends before time runs out!

Use your mouse to click a picture piece then click where you want it to move to.

You can turn the music off if you so desire...

How to turn off music:

  • Click the gear in upper left corner while playing the game!
  • Click on the song note button, you just muted the music! 
  • You can click on the 'Go!' button to play the game again!

Cause it's your business...

Assed used:

SCRAMBLED PICTURE GAME by Puppeteer

Tab Time  Kids and Parents Booklet - PDF

Audio from Tab Time Season 1 Episode 1 - How Things Grow

My kids have been asking me to make them a Tab Time game, so this is it...
